title: White House targets 'junk fees' on student loans and other higher education costs
description: The White House touted its actions to reduce the expenses burdening students, including moving to end origination fees on student loans.
keywords: Personal finance, Breaking News: Politics, Politics, Joe Biden, Government and politics, business news
snippet: President Joe Biden announces the cancellation of an additional $1.2 billion in student loan debt for about 153,000 borrowers, at meeting with community at Culv...
